message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $11,500?
